channel.title: Docs on Ecological Models
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Ecological Models

item.title: Conditional Likelihood
item.description: Model Description # Algebra # $$\hat{N} = \frac{M_{t+1}}{1-\prod^{t}(1-p_t)}$$ $$y_{i,t} \sim Bernoulli(p_t) $$ Simulation # N <- 150 #True population size n_occ <- 4 #Number of trapping occasions p <- 0.50 #Probability of first detection true_detections <- array(NA, dim=c(N,n_occ)) for (t in 1:n_occ){ true_detections[,t] <- rbinom(n=N,size=1,prob=p) } observed <- true_detections[apply(true_detections,1,max) == 1,] MNKA <- nrow(observed) print( paste0("Number ever detected: ", MNKA,sep = " ") ) #number ever detected ## [1] "Number ever detected: 143 " JAGS # library(R2jags) data <- list( y=observed, nsites=nrow(observed), MNKA=MNKA, n_occ=n_occ ) modelstring <- textConnection( " model { # Likelihood for(i in 1:nsites) { # observation model for(j in 1:4) { y[i, j] ~ dbern(p) } } for(t in 1:4){ p_un[t] <- (1-p) } # Priors p ~ dunif(0, 1) # Uninformative prior # Derived values N <- (MNKA / (1-prod(p_un[]))) } " ) parameters <- c("p","N") inits <- function() { list( ) } ni <- 10000 ; nt <- 1 ; nb <- 5000 ; nc <- 3 model <- jags(data, inits, parameters, modelstring, n.

item.title: Single Season
item.description: Model Description # Algebra # Simulation # y <- 1 {{< tabs “uniqueid” >}} {{< tab “JAGS” >}} data <- list( y = y ) modelstring <- textConnection( " model{ # Likelihood for(i in 1:nSites) { # biological model z[i] ~ dbern(psi[i]) # observation model y[i] ~ dbin(p * z[i], n[i]) } # Priors psi ~ dunif(0, 1) p ~ dunif(1, 1) # Derived variable N <- sum(z) } " ) parameters <- c() inits <- function() { list() } ni <- 10000 nt <- 1 nb <- 5000 nc <- 3 #JagsModel <- jags(data, inits, parameters, modelstring, n.
